actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide nutrition programs for handicapped dependents of older Americans.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to entitle handicapped dependents of eligible individuals to participate in the nutritional programs for the elderly established under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide nutrition programs for handicapped dependents of older Americans.
